select fp_no, fp_category, fp_title, fp_content,id, to_char(fp_time,'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as fp_time,fp_count from (select fp_no, fp_category, fp_title, fp_content,id, fp_time,fp_count, rownum rn from (select fp_no, fp_category, fp_title, fp_content,id, fp_time,fp_count from free_post
where upper(id) like upper(#searchId#)
where upper(fp_title) like upper(#searchTitle#)
order by fp_no desc ) ) where rn between #start# and #end#
order by fp_count desc
order by fp_time desc
select fp_no, fp_category, fp_title, fp_content,id, to_char(fp_time,'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as fp_time, fp_count from free_post where fp_no=#no#

select ceil((select count(*) from free_post
where upper(id) like upper(#searchId#)
where upper(fp_title) like upper(#searchTitle#)
)/#pageCount#) count from dual
